documentation: PrtgDevicesEntidad : Represents a device entity in PRTG with properties for ID, device name, host, and tags.

code:
USE [catalogos]

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 21:12:51.357601
-- Description:	Obtiene todos los dispositivos PRTG
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetAll]
    @fechaInicio DATETIME = NULL,
    @fechaFin DATETIME = NULL
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idPrtg], [idObj], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE (@fechaInicio IS NULL OR [FechaCreacion] >= @fechaInicio)
      AND (@fechaFin IS NULL OR [FechaCreacion] <= @fechaFin)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 21:12:51.357601
-- Description:	Obtiene un dispositivo PRTG por ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetById]
    @idPrtg INT
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idPrtg], [idObj], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idPrtg] = @idPrtg
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 21:12:51.357601
-- Description:	A単ade un nuevo dispositivo PRTG
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Add]
    @idPrtg INT,
    @idObj INT,
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO [dbo].[prtgDevices] ([idPrtg], [idObj], [device], [host], [tags])
    VALUES (@idPrtg, @idObj, @device, @host, @tags)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 21:12:51.357601
-- Description:	Elimina un dispositivo PRTG por ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Delete]
    @idPrtg INT
AS
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idPrtg] = @idPrtg
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 21:12:51.357601
-- Description:	Actualiza un dispositivo PRTG
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Update]
    @idPrtg INT,
    @idObj INT,
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    UPDATE [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    SET [idObj] = @idObj,
        [device] = @device,
        [host] = @host,
        [tags] = @tags
    WHERE [idPrtg] = @idPrtg
END

prtgDevices_Add : A単ade un nuevo dispositivo PRTG
